ivardefs.name: amount
ivardefs.desc: Specifies how many (or how much) of the items there are in this Medication.  For example, 250 mg per tablet.  This is expressed as a ratio where the numerator is 250mg and the denominator is 1 tablet.

ivardefs.name: isActive
ivardefs.desc: Indication of whether this ingredient affects the therapeutic action of the drug.

properties.desc: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.
